content: @Josh Triplett I was wondering if nominated PRs reach the team for getting input. I nominated https://github.com/rust-lang/reference/pull/1152 (updating repr(rust) layout), and just wanted to check if there is some other way to get it on the radar.
I had thought that nominated reference PRs showed up on our agenda, but it appears that they're not.
Wasn't this an issue last time that the reference repo wasn't doing showing up (I believe it was a problem with 1168 as well).
I think the problem is that they were not using I-lang-nominated
I renamed the label and I think it works now @Eric Huss
